lines.text: Everyone in this town knows I've only got one leg. And that motherfucker grabbed the wrong one.
It's better to check out than to go home all fucked up.
[Cleon randomly decapitates a dead Vietnamese soldier with his machete]
Oh man, Cleon what the fuck?
I'd rather be home with a fucked-up hand up in some pussy than to be out here healthier than a motherfucker without it... Shit
No bad habits, ma. Except for a little killing.
Ya'll may think I'm crazy but I just want to do something that's different
Well, gettin' your fuckin' head blown off is different, HAHA. Hey man, turn that shit down and slow this mother fucker down, ain't nobody in a hurry to get to school!
My great great great granddaddy was a pimp and a slave. He would have his hoes out in the field picking his cotton for him, he didn't have to do a goddamn thing!
I was born by the pussy, I'll die by the pussy.
Oh, did you fucking see that, man!
Motherfucker, you blew up the whole fucking truck, motherfucker!
[Cleon blasts a Viet Cong in the head, killing him]
Now you're good, now Jesus loves you.

[Delilah saying to Anthony after he returns from the war]
It's not your fault you've been brainwashed by America.

[at the table, dividing up a huge stack of bills after the big score]
Man, one thing I can't figure out. People be out of work everywhere and the government just be throwing money away!
That's Uncle Sam for you, son. Money to burn.
